data.text:
Yuvika Chaudhary is an actress, model and social media influencer who hails from India and exclusively works in the Bollywood film industry. She has acted in various super duper hit serials and movies including ‘Om Shanti Om’. It was this superbly hit movie and her amazing performances that it was critically acclaimed. This talented actress has appeared in many TV reality shows including Bigg Boss 9 and others. Moreover, she has acted in various Indian TV serials for which she got immense love and appreciation from her fans and viewers.

At 5’5” with beautiful looks, she poses an impressive personality. She loves to travel and shares her travel posts on her social media accounts; she has created a huge fan following on her travel blog.

In 2004, she had taken part in ‘Zee Cine Stars Ki Khoj’, thereafter, she took up a very popular TV serial “Astitva- Ek Prem Kahani”. In 2006, Yuvika appeared in a music video called, “Wada Tainu” by Himesh Reshammiya, a number in his album “Aap Ka Suroor” which became incredibly popular lateron. Meanwhile, she made an appearance in a Coca –Cola advertisement which gained her much recognition in the modelling world. Moreover, she worked in the Punjabi movie named “Yaaran Da Katchup” which was released in the year 2014.

During the initial days of her career, she tried her hands on many things including fashion & modelling. Today, she is an incredibly popular fashion influencer, the brand ambassador for many classy brands and a supermodel who has walked on the ramp for many renowned fashion designers. There are numerous fashion styles inspired by her Carrying An Overcoat with a turtleneck or high neck sweaters as overcoats are in vogue these days. “To finish this look, you better wear a slim belt over the overcoat”, she says.

According to her, simple and small accessories can glam up your look. Simple stone earrings are always in fashion irrespective of seasons. However, in winters, woolen scarves and woolen sweaters look amazingly attractive. With a woolen dress, one can finish the look with an overcoat and ankle length boots. For winters, a short skirt with matching high length boots can be a very attractive look.

Although, she is popularly known for the role she had played in the most-watched movie “Om Shanti Om”, starring Shahrukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, and Deepika Padukone, her other record breaking movies include “Summer” and “Toh Baat Pakki” where she impressed her fans immensely. A high-spirited and vibrant actress, Yuvika Chaudhary has established her long career very carefully; she has worked extensively not just in Hindi but in Kannada movies also. In 2009, she made her first appearance in the Kannada movie “Maleyali Jotheyali, in which she played a lead role and worked alongside Ganesh, the superstar of Kannada movies. In 2015, she appeared in the TV reality show “Bigg Boss 9” which was aired on Colors TV. In 2019, she again appeared in the dance reality TV show “Nach Baliye” and went on to win the competition.

In 2004, she had taken part in ‘Zee Cine Stars Ki Khoj’, thereafter, she took up a very popular TV serial “Astitva- Ek Prem Kahani”. In 2006, Yuvika is one of the highest paid Indian Television actresses who charged approximately Rs 3-4 lakh per week in the show ‘Big Boss Season 9’. Her estimated net worth is around US $2 million which is equivalent to RS 13 Crore.

Yuvika appeared in a music video called, “Wada Tainu” by Himesh Reshammiya, a number in his album “Aap Ka Suroor” which became incredibly popular lateron. Meanwhile, she made an appearance in a Coca –Cola advertisement which gained her much recognition in the modelling world. Moreover, she worked in the Punjabi movie named “Yaaran Da Katchup” which was released in the year 2014.

Chaudhary dated talented actor Vipul Roy for a very long time with whom she broke when she met Prince Narula during Bigg Boss 9 whom she later married in October 2018. Later, they won the TV Reality show “Nach Baliye 9” together. “I feel the most precious diamond of my life is my partner Prince (Narula). He gifted me a diamond ring when he proposed to me, and this is a jewellery piece that is really close to my heart,” said Yuvika.

Recently, Yuvika revealed that along with Prince, she too was offered Khatron Ke Khiladi 11. She said that she was scared of the genre of Khatron, and if at all she had taken up the show, it would have been for Prince. “I am so scared of this genre of ‘Khatron…’ Prince is passionate about adventure and likes to be challenged, but I want to run away seeing those stunts”, said the actress. Yuvika and Prince were seen together in a few music videos as well. She will be doing a song with Prince and a Punjabi singer. She is all set to turn into a singer!

Regarding their chemistry, she said, “As a couple, we don’t feel our careers need to be strictly separate. The chemistry you see on screen between us is still organic despite being married for three years, none of it is an act. We consult each other when we get offers. Prince guides me in Punjabi industry, and I listen to him. Its vice versa when he gets Hindi offers. We respect each others’ advices.”

Talking about her personal jewellery preferences, she says: “I prefer to wear lighter jewellery on most occasions because you don’t want to feel heavy. If you go to a party or a wedding then you want to enjoy it. And if you wear heavy pieces, you can’t enjoy yourself. I feel the simpler you are, the more beautiful you look.”
